Pyatoa¶

Adjoint Tomography Operational Assistance¶

Pyatoa is a workflow management tool designed for the adjoint tomography problem. Its purpose is to provide an easy to use command line or scripting interface for intermediate steps in the tomography problem. These steps include data retrieval, standardization, preprocessing, visualization. Pyatoa relies heavily on ObsPy for all seismic trace processing and manipulation. It also calls upon Pyflex and Pyadjoint for misfit quantification and adjoint source creation, and PyASDF for I/O.
